name: WritingTipoftheDaywithMichaelLaRonn
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Do you want to write better & faster, write smarter, beat writer's block, and be prolific? In this daily podcast, prolific author Michael La Ronn will help you elevate your writing in just 2-3 minutes per day. 

Drawing on the knowledge he's learned from writing 50+ books of fiction and nonfiction, a popular YouTube channel with over 13,000 subscribers (Author Level Up), and speaking to writing crowds of over 1,000 people, Michael La Ronn will teach you the practical tips on what it takes to be a professional writer. 

New episodes Monday-Friday.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
